title: Mom gets traffic stop, cops find dead tot boy in trunk! Uber driver danger!? And did missing teen witness murder?
itunes:title: Mom gets traffic stop, cops find dead tot boy in trunk! Uber driver danger!? And did missing teen witness murder?
description:
A 14-year-old Sarasota, Florida, boy has been missing since last September, not long after he apparently witnessed murder. Nancy Grace searches for answers about what happened to Jabez Spann with Cold Case Research Institute director Sheryl McCollum, private investigator Vincent Hill, and forensic psychiatrist Dr. Carole Lieberman. Reporter Larry Meagher joins Nancy to discuss the case of an Alabama woman who is facing criminal charges after police allegedly found her newborn son’s body in her trunk during a traffic stop. Co-host Alan Duke reports on the case against a man who allegedly posed as an Uber driver to lure college coeds into his car where he then raped and robbed them.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
